title: Can`t log in.
body:
I`m trying to get my Alpha Client running again (reinstalled the game twice + repaired it 3 times).
I`m always stuck at authentication no matter how log I`ll wait.

Logs: Can`t use the Paste Bin link here
Client: http://imgur.com/pROvCKz
Task Manager: http://imgur.com/9hnYL51 (german)

replies.body: Hey Hentai Lux, can you submit a ticket to player support with your logs? We're seeing this issue intermittently and are trying to hunt it down. Let me know if you have trouble.
Well,IÂ´m in contact with Doug the Moleman (EUW) support but we still can`t fix the issue.
